parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF11240017) at the end. This strongly suggests an attempt at electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used by candidates and are mandated for electoral materials.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>While the post doesn't explicitly mention a specific candidate by name or surname, the strong call to "NU VOTAȚI O ILUZIE CREATĂ DE INTELIGENȚĂ ARTIFICIALĂ" and the overall tone suggest an attempt to influence voters against a particular type of candidate or campaign strategy.  The presence of the CMF number further reinforces this suspicion.  The message is not directly naming a candidate, but it is clearly targeting a specific type of campaign, which could be interpreted as indirectly influencing the vote against candidates using AI-generated content in their campaigns. This is a grey area, and further investigation is needed to determine if this is a violation.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience.  The use of hashtags further suggests an attempt to increase visibility and reach.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post appears to be influencing voters' choices. The repeated call not to vote for AI-generated illusions strongly suggests an attempt to sway public opinion against certain candidates or campaigns. The message is designed to create distrust and discourage voting for candidates perceived as using AI manipulation. This is a clear attempt to influence the vote, even if indirectly.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not adhere to journalistic standards. It lacks objectivity and presents a biased opinion, aiming to persuade rather than inform. While it uses a narrative structure, it's clearly designed as a persuasive piece of political communication, not a neutral news report.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>While the post is presented as a personal anecdote, its clear political message and call to action transcend a simple expression of personal opinion. The narrative serves as a vehicle to deliver a persuasive message against a specific type of campaign, making it electoral propaganda.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>913307383785120</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post, while not explicitly naming a candidate, strongly suggests an attempt to influence voters against candidates using AI-generated content in their campaigns. The presence of a CMF number, the paid advertisement format, the wide reach, and the clear call to action ("NU VOTAȚI") all point towards electoral propaganda.  The argument that it's a personal opinion is weak, given the clear political intent and persuasive nature of the message.  The post aims to create distrust and discourage voting for a certain type of campaign, thus directly influencing the electoral outcome.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Unspecified - Candidates using AI-generated content</name><impact>NEGATIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Alexandru Rogobete, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări plătite pe Facebook (ID 913307383785120) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu mesajul  „NU VOTAȚI O ILUZIE CREATĂ DE INTELIGENȚĂ ARTIFICIALĂ!”,  care, deși nu numește explicit un candidat, are ca efect electoral influențarea negativă a votului împotriva candidaților care utilizează conținut generat de inteligență artificială în campaniile lor.  Prezența numărului CMF11240017 indică clar o legătură cu propaganda electorală.  Postarea, având o cheltuială de sub 100 RON și o estimare a audienței de 500.000 - 1.000.000 de persoane,  se adresează publicului larg și are ca obiectiv clar influențarea votului, încălcând astfel prevederile legale privind continuarea propagandei electorale după încheierea perioadei legale.  Contactul advertiserului este alexandru.rogobete@umft.ro și +40759852479.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
